set(target_triple aarch64-unknown-linux-gnu)
set(target_dir aarch64-linux-gnu)
set(STDLIBCXX_VERSION 8)
set(CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME Linux CACHE STRING "")
set(CMAKE_SYSTEM_PROCESSOR aarch64 CACHE STRING "")

set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER_TARGET ${target_triple} CACHE STRING "")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_TARGET ${target_triple} CACHE STRING "")
set(CMAKE_SHARED_LINKER_FLAGS "-fuse-ld=lld" CACHE STRING "")
set(CMAKE_MODULE_LINKER_FLAGS "-fuse-ld=lld" CACHE STRING "")
set(CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS "-fuse-ld=lld" CACHE STRING "")

# set(CMAKE_C_FLAGS "-mllvm -global-isel -mllvm -global-isel-abort=0 -O3 -save-temps" CACHE STRING "")
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} \
    -isystem ${CMAKE_SYSROOT}/include/c++/${STDLIBCXX_VERSION}/ \
    -isystem ${CMAKE_SYSROOT}/include/c++/${STDLIBCXX_VERSION}/${target_dir} \
    -isystem ${CMAKE_SYSROOT}/include/c++/${STDLIBCXX_VERSION}/backward"
  CACHE STRING "")

set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "${LLVM_BUILT_ROOT}/bin/clang" CACHE STRING "")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "${LLVM_BUILT_ROOT}/bin/clang++" CACHE STRING "")
set(CMAKE_AR "${LLVM_BUILT_ROOT}/bin/llvm-ar" CACHE STRING "")
